step.sql: SELECT P.* FROM NI_VAL_EXCEPTION P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh];
SELECT P.* FROM CK_RESULT_OBJECT P WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM NI_VAL_EXCEPTION T WHERE P.MD5_CODE=T.MD5_CODE AND T.MESH_ID [mesh]);
DELETE FROM NI_VAL_EXCEPTION P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh];
DELETE FROM FROM CK_RESULT_OBJECT P WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM NI_VAL_EXCEPTION T WHERE P.MD5_CODE=T.MD5_CODE AND T.MESH_ID [mesh]);
